system.description: A large 3- or 4-pronged hook made of specially hardened iron, used to anchor a rope. It can be thrown to hook onto surfaces, allowing the user to climb otherwise inaccessible areas. A successful attack roll is needed to secure it properly.
system.unidentifiedDesc: A large 3- or 4-pronged hook made of specially hardened iron, used to anchor a rope. It can be thrown to hook onto surfaces, allowing the user to climb otherwise inaccessible areas. A successful attack roll is needed to secure it properly.
